statements: SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products;
SELECT description, inventory FROM Products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE inventory < 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 50.00 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE inventory > 100 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT AVG(price) AS average_price, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM Products;
SELECT * FROM fashion_products;
SELECT name, price FROM fashion_products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT id, description FROM fashion_products ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT name, inventory FROM fashion_products WHERE inventory > 0 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, size, quantity FROM fashion_inventory WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY size DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY name DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, description FROM fashion_products WHERE inventory > 0;
SELECT id, name, price FROM fashion_inventory WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY id;
SELECT id, size, quantity FROM fashion_inventory WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM fashion_products p JOIN fashion_inventory i ON p.id = i.product_id WHERE p.price < 50 ORDER BY p.price DESC, i.quantity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, description FROM products WHERE inventory_level > 0 ORDER BY product_id DESC;

SELECT product_name, price, category_name FROM products JOIN product_categories ON products.product_id = product_categories.product_id JOIN categories ON product_categories.category_id = categories.category_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS product_count FROM product_categories JOIN categories ON product_categories.category_id = categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE inventory_level > 0 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, c.category_name FROM products p JOIN product_categories pc ON p.product_id = pc.product_id JOIN categories c ON pc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT MAX(price) AS max_price, MIN(price) AS min_price FROM products;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE inventory_level > 10 AND category_id IN (SELECT category_id FROM categories WHERE category_name = 'Electronics');
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, inventory_level FROM products WHERE inventory_level < 10;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE inventory_level < 10 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT product_name, price, category_name FROM products JOIN product_categories ON products.product_id = product_categories.product_id JOIN categories ON product_categories.category_id = categories.category_id ORDER BY category_name ASC, price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' ORDER BY order_date ASC;

SELECT product_name, description, price, category_name FROM products JOIN product_categories ON products.product_id = product_categories.product_id JOIN categories ON product_categories.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, description FROM products WHERE inventory_level > 0;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, price, inventory_level FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY inventory_level DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, description FROM products WHERE inventory_level > 0;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(product_id) AS product_count FROM categories LEFT JOIN product_categories ON categories.category_id = product_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT product_name, rating FROM products JOIN reviews ON products.product_id = reviews.product_id WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT order_id, product_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id ORDER BY order_date;
